text: At least three ships of the Russian navy have borne the name Pyotr Veliky, Petr Veliky or Pyotr Velikiy (Пётр Вели́кий), in honor of Peter the Great of Russia * , an icebreaker launched in 1912. * , an ironclad warship launched in 1872. * , a originally named Yuri Andropov. She was launched in 1996. Category:Russian Navy ship names
title: Russian ship Pyotr Veliky
